mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT
AND PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN PAYMENT PM ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = PM.PRODUCT_NO
PM.PAY_STATUS = '결제완료'
AND PR.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN ORDERITEM OD ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = OD.PRODUCT_NO
OD.ORDER_STATUS = '주문완료'
AND PR.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN CANCELORDER CO ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = CO.PRODUCT_NO
CO.CANCEL_STATUS = '취소신청'
AND PR.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT PR.PRODUCT_NO, PR.PRODUCT_IMG, OD.ORDER_ID, PR.PRODUCT_NAME, PR.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PR.PRODUCT_SALE, PR.PRODUCT_PRICE, PR.SALES_CNT, OD.DELIVERY_FEE, OD.RECIPIENT_NAME, OD.RECIPIENT_ADDRESS, OD.RECIPIENT_PHONE, OD.DELIVERY_REQUEST, PM.PAY_METHOD FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN ORDERITEM OD ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = OD.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PAYMENT PM ON OD.PRODUCT_NO = PM.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PR.PRODUCT_NO = #{product_no}

SELECT PR.PRODUCT_NO, PR.PRODUCT_IMG, OD.ORDER_ID, PR.PRODUCT_NAME, PR.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PR.PRODUCT_SALE, PR.PRODUCT_PRICE, PR.SALES_CNT, OD.DELIVERY_FEE, CO.CANCEL_DATE, CO.CANCEL_REASON, PM.PAY_METHOD FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN ORDERITEM OD ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = OD.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PAYMENT PM ON OD.PRODUCT_NO = PM.PRODUCT_NO JOIN CANCELORDER CO ON PM.PRODUCT_NO = CO.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PR.PRODUCT_NO = #{product_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CANCELORDER (CANCEL_NUM, ORDER_ID, PAY_ID, USER_ID, CANCEL_REASON, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_STATUS, REFUND_PRICE, USER_NO, ADMIN_ID) SELECT CANCELORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, OD.ORDER_ID, PM.PAY_ID, UI.USER_ID, #{cancel_reason}, sysdate, '취소완료', (PR.PRODUCT_PRICE * OD.SALES_CNT) - ((PR.PRODUCT_PRICE / 100.0 * PR.PRODUCT_SALE) * OD.SALES_CNT), 1, 'ADMIN1' FROM ORDERITEM OD JOIN PRODUCT PR ON OD.PRODUCT_NO = PR.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PAYMENT PM ON OD.ORDER_ID = PM.ORDER_ID JOIN USERINFO UI ON OD.USER_NO = UI.USER_NO WHERE OD.ORDER_ID = #{order_id}
